For windows:
 * Install VMWare Player and Ubuntu for [http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/11287/how-to-run-ubuntu-in-windows-7-with-vmware-player/ Windows]


OpenWRT:
 * Install some extra packages with the Synaptic package manager
{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential subversion libncurses5-dev zlib1g-dev gawk flex gettext git gperf nasm mercurial
}}}

 * Checkout openwrt trunk repository
{{{
mkdir ~/openwrt/
cd ~/openwrt/
svn co svn://svn.openwrt.org/openwrt/trunk/
}}}
